alert.note: Alert for Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 11 at 8:33PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Red Lake River at Crookston affecting Polk County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota...Minnesota... Maple River near Mapleton (South of I-94) affecting Cass County. Buffalo River near Dilworth affecting Clay County. Buffalo River near Hawley affecting Clay County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red Lake River at Crookston. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD STAGE. EOC activated if advised by EOC Committee. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Monday the stage was 13.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow and continue rising to a crest of 19.6 feet Friday. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
